alert.note: Alert for Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued March 05 at 8:59PM MST until March 05 at 9:15PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM MST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MEADE AND CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 859 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 4 miles north of Curlew Lake to 4 miles west of Thompson Butte, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Poor visibility in heavy snow. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 62 and 79. Locations impacted include... Eastern Rapid City, Rapid Valley, Ellsworth Air Force Base, Box Elder, New Underwood, Caputa, Hereford, Curlew Lake, Rapid City Airport, Hart Ranch, Thompson Butte, Black Gap and Viewfield. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.
